content.detailedDescription:
At approx 3:15 on this date, i was walking to my front door.  i heard the roar of jets overhead.  i was aware that the 180th fighter wing of the ohio national guard was training this week. i looked up to watch the jets.  i saw two pass overhead, at a typical low altitude, as they were just a few miles from the toledo express ong base.  one jet was a few seconds (10 or so) ahead of the other.  as the second jet passed, i saw through the tree canopy a much "higher" black fixed wing boomerang shaped craft traveling due east.  the ong jets were traveling due west.  the black craft had a smooth semicircular front edge with tapered wing edges, and scalloped back edge.  due to the jets i could not tell if the ufo made any sound.  there were no lights, emissions, and the shape of the craft was sharp at all times.  it flew for about 5-7 seconds due east, the made a sharp but smooth turn northeast and then was behind the sightline of my neighboring condo unit.  at no time did the ong jets appear to notice this craft of deviate from their standard flight paths back to their base.  

my first reaction was one of "what the h--l is that?"  then, it seemed similar to some designs of non-publicly acknowledged "flying wings" i've seen.
content.summary: Black fast moving fixed wing craft noted while watching local f-14s fly over.

content.detailedDescription: I snapped this photo looking eastward on ajo rd. and la cholla blvd. in tucson az.  i did not see the object personally. nor did i see any airplanes at all that evening. not even military jets from dmafb. it appeared on my photo i took while pointing east, towards the city, with my iphone 5s. if you look closely at the six lights above the stop lights, you can almost make out the shape of a large maybe mile wide object over tucson's az southside.  it resembles either a disc shape or a triangle above the city lights.
content.summary: Large object in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: 3 round lights at base side, long standing tall light upward from center base, 2 lights on top outside corners of standing light. object moved from north to south at a slow steady rate with clear skies.
content.summary: 3 round lights at base, long standing light upward from center base, 2 lights on top corners of standing light. object moved from north to south at a slow steady rate with clear skies.

content.detailedDescription: After a late dinner i went out to my front patio to have a smoke. as i sat there, facing north-west i see this bright flash appear in the sky. it lingered for 5 or 6 seconds then blinked out. a few more seconds go by and the bright light returns. this time it shoots out this red beam of light towards a mountain to the east. the beam lasts for maybe 3 seconds then returns back to the spherical bright white light just as fast as it went towards the mountain and then poof!! the light disappears into thin air just the way it came. ever since then i've been watching the skies, and bought a little 14 pixel fuji camera to hopefully catch something. as it turns out i have caught some interesting shots that i would like to send to your organization. i have about 4 photos.
content.summary: A bright flash of brillant white light appeared for approx. 5 seconds then disappeared, a few seconds later it flashed brightly again, only this time it shot a red laser-beam over to a mountain to the east of it's position.The beam returned thenwent out

content.detailedDescription:
I was young and for entertainment i would climb a windmill tower and look around at distant sites like humboldt. it wasn't long and suddenly three lights appeared east of me over a near bye lake. suddenly they quickly like instantaneously they moved about four miles straight south of where i first noticed them. they were about the size of a full moon just coming over the horizon but it was a starry night no moon. i had no idea of what they were and i was not afraid. i could distinguish the distance from me that they were hovering it wasn't something close up. i could tell they were over the centre of the lake my depth perception was accurate.  they then quickly moved back to the centre of the lake hovered for a bit and then just disappeared. the lights just went out. i never spoke of this to anyone for years until more and more sightings were witnessed then i told a few close friends. i've heard of similar shapes similar to what i witnessed since then.

regards
content.summary: I was on a windmill tower nice evening and looking around the country when suddenly 3 round lights appeared over a nearby lake

content.detailedDescription: I am a 26 year old male electrical engineer from india. prior to the sighting, i had recently read about dr emoto's famous water experiment. this got me started on the new age trail. as i am a voracious reader , soon i found myself reading all occult phenomenon. when i read about syncronicity, i immediately fell asleep and when i woke i saw only ones and zeroes on my cell fone arranged in a symmetrical manner. soon, i was reading about the meditation given in the pao website. it was necessary to call a ufo. i did that with my friend and activated myself as the website demanded. then , one evening i had the urge to go to a secluded valley behind my hostel where i sat for meditation and in about 20 minutes, i could sense a human like shape/form talking to me in my mind. it said that they were arcturians. i had just opened my eyes and i saw the ufo hovering quite close to me. it was about 100 feet from me and blinked in regular fashion. i was ecstatic with joy, joy that i have never ever felt before! i asked it ( mentally) that how do i believe if its of et origin ... it simply made maneuvers which were impossible by human craft ... like going in reverse instantly and changing direction of flight. it would sometime hide itself and then reappear in a different place. i was very excited to see it. as if it was my family i had been separated from since birth that was visiting me. then the ufo simply vanished . this has made me profoundly more spiritual and esoteric in my interactions with people and myself. i also witnessed a second sighting after i had requested them to show me once more their craft ... but, this time they appeared after a week on a morning. i dont know whether the 'talks' i have with these beings are real or not but the ufo was definitely real ... both of them. since then i have been seeing numbers like 1221, 1111, 2222, 2332, 4444, and the likes all the time when i glance at the watch or license plates. at least more than 5-6 times a day , so it cannot be a coincidence. i seriously belive that we will witness a mass landing event before 2022. i don't know how, but i have been told this in my meditations and it feels right. anyway , the truth is pouring out from all directions.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I called the ufo using the meditation method of pao. they talked to me telepathically before coming. it was an arcturian craft. classic saucer shaped, flickering with bright lights and it frequently changed it position and disappeared and reappeared .

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck watching the night sky, many ufos were seen through out june and july so i was watiching for them. then i saw what, at first looked like an airliner on fire, flying in the direction of my house. i had stood up and looked closer, by the time it was close enough, i realized it was a massive black delta with two huge engines on the two tips of the rear end of the craft. it had a red strobe light on the bottom center of the craft. an f-16 was following close behind with afterburners. it was not in an aggressive posture and was basically following the thing. as it was directly over me i called my grand mother and she was able to see the last of the sighting ans it flew north east and disappeared from sight. i see many things in the sky, and being an air force bratt i know my civilian and millitary aircraft. this is not of human origin.
content.summary: Black delta flew over my house with a contrail, closely followed by 1 f16

content.detailedDescription:
I look at my email out of the same opened a page with pictures of rays and look at the pictures i saw that i was there and caught my attention, apparently the one who took the photo did not notice what's there nor those of paginaweb where the public just as pictures of lightning during an electrical storm.
i would like to investigate the photo to see if this trick-or 100% real, thanks.
content.summary: I was checking my hotmail and when i left the email were photos of lightning msn page and saw that picture that caught my attention.

content.detailedDescription:
Object was found after it was loaded on my computer.It was not visible during the airshow.Itwas too bright@the time
.Just below the object was cf18 fighter jet doing manouvers.Thedatewas june30,2014approximately2pm
in the afternoon
content.summary: Round opaque disc

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Rumors of alien activity at former navy base. pictures taken by a friend shows huge spiral ufo in blue sky over over base buildings. spiral changes shape and reduces its size and appears to land on roof of old navy hospital and church next to it. it eventually leaves the roof area and leaves gaining in size. we went back several times to investigate and took pictures at old hospital. took a photo of what appears to be an apparition coming out of the old hospital. took bicycles across base and runways and were followed by men on bikes who were watching us with binoculars. eventually we were approached by one who appears out of nowhere. he asked some strange questions related to why we were there. we later saw him watching us from a distance with binoculars. i was later visited by a strange black helicopter above my home. it blasted me twice with some kind of device that vibrated my body. it made three passes and i knew that it was sending me a warning. we have continued our investigation and have several pictures of unexplained phenomena . i now recognize vehicles and some individuals who seem to be patrolling the base which is now in civilian ownership. one civilian looking vehicle seen frequently has military dressed persons on board. i have seen men hidden way out on the runways watching any activity with binoculars and others in vehicles that seem to be watching us closely. we are continuing our investigation. i am submitting one remarkable photo of the spiral ufo but we have many.
content.summary: Spiral ufo @ former navy air base. changes shape and goes in and out of bldg.  ho

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 4pm saturday 8/2/14 sitting on patio looked up into sky saw gourd shaped white object flying thru sky from se heading to nw no sound, no blinking lights, just at a fast speed. definitely not shape of usual airplane. followed it with my eyes until it just disappeared. then about 15-30 seconds later saw what looked like military jets flying in same direction as ufo. i began to wonder if it was a drone?
content.summary: Gourd shaped ufo over denver

content.detailedDescription: I was a high school student back then, in a classroom around 6pm, preparing to hear from my teacher a "ok, class dismiss" but suddenly the light turn off, i taught it was only a joke, but realised that a power  shutdown in the whole city. we talking about it, my teacher tell us to calm down,me and my classmates sighted a bright object at the sky thru the windows, we debating what it is, at first, my classmate told me its an airplane, im waiting fo a humming sound which is i am able to hear because its an airplane, the object has a path pointing toward us. then my other classmate shout, "its not an airplane, it doesnt have lights and wings on side, but instead in a middle of it. we concluded its a helicopter with a flashlight or spotlight. its slowly approaching the school. due to my curiosity, i step out from the classroom, waiting the "helicopter", but in surprise, that object above the school building, directly above us doestn have a propeller, doesnt have a noise of a helicopter, doesnt have a wind from it, so its not a helicopter. it is a giant plate like object in the mid air, with a circular bright light in the middle. i feel excited, because for me its new technology, a new flying machine. it stay above us for about 5 minutes, we staring at it, around 500 student with me are staring at it, then suddenly electricity power on, the object disapper. after that, other day, to my surprise, me and 4 of my classmates are the only ones remember about it. im an engineer today, a lot of people doesnt believe when im telling them my experience. but i know my self, it is real. yah, aliens , ufo really exist. i want to see more. hopefully i see more in the near future...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: High school curiosity

content.detailedDescription: I was getting in the passenger seat of our vehicle and my husband was just making his way to the car and had not yet passed in front of where i was sitting. when he got to my corner of the vehicle, he stared into the sky.  at that moment, he banged on the hood of the vehicle and told me to get out of the car.  when i got out he pointed into the sky above the house across the street.  when i saw it, i ran inside to grab my brother who was there for thanksgiving weekend, so that he could witness it as well.  we all witnessed it descending towards us at a fairly fast speed.  just before coming in contact with us and our home, it abruptly changed direction and flew away towards the lake, appearing as though it had landed.  being that my brother is a licensed pilot, he knew who he should call.  he called trenton air force base, knowing that they deal with our airspace.  trenton looked into it, and returned his call saying that the only flight that was scheduled to be in the area was one that had already taken off,and that it landed as scheduled at the buttonville airport.  they also said that they have not received any emergency calls regarding any aircraft on fire.  i know it wasn't a man made aircraft. it was a huge ball of fire, trying to chase us down.  it is extremely shocking and very bizarre.  we drove around in the direction that it had flown away, but had no luck locating it.
content.summary: Fireball coming towards us.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside watching tv when i saw a very large incredibly bright fiery red/orange shape in the sky that i could see outside my patio door.  i went immediately outside to see it and i observed it change shape and direction.  it was close above the tree tops somewhere around 150 to 200 yards. the object was very large and round at first but when it changed direction it also became longer and more like a fat short cylinder that was larger on one end or bell shape. it looked like the depictions of ufo's on some religious paintings that i've seen.  it pulsated and had edges that looked like a living fire in the sky.  it moved very slowly, and seemed to change direction as if it were guided in some way. i called my husband to come look and at first he said it was an aircraft of some sort.  i said that it was definitely no plane.  i had been watching it by that time for at least a minute.  it was headed easterly from a southeast direction.  after tracking it through the trees in my back yard i went out to my front yard to get a closer look since it was heading to a more open vantage point.  by the time i arrived in front it was simply gone.  after looking for it for several more minutes, i heard a series of booms then some rumbles far off in the distance.   i've seen heat ball lighting and this was nothing like that.  it was much larger, brighter and had what seemed like directional, hovering and shape changing ability. this was no orb, as it was not smooth and it pulsed like it was on fire and had fiery edges. it was also no comet or shooting star as it moved slowly and at one point hovered. i felt inside that it was moving with intelligent direction. it disappeared from an open section of the sky where it had been just moments before in the very short (seconds) amount of time it took me to run to my front yard. i will never forget what i saw. awesome...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Giant fireball type light in sky that changed from round to short fat cylindrical or bell like shap

content.detailedDescription:
i went out to call in my cats, and i saw something odd in the sky. i went in the house and got my camera (canon powershot a2200) and binoculars. i took 59 photographs. when i first saw it, i felt it was something out of the ordinary. the sun was just setting, but there was still plenty of light outside. i watched it over half an hour, and it began to give me a strange feeling of unease. there seemed to be more than one light, or part of itñthen it would all fade away completely. then it would return. the last photograph that i took of it is, perhaps, the best: it shows one large object shining light onto clouds above it.

i do not have photographs of the most disturbing part of this. i was watching it with binoculars, when it began to take a different form: it began to look like an oval piece of the moon, except it wasnõt the moon: it was oval, then oval with a bright light at the base of it, then it all just faded away to nothing. as of this writing, it has not returned.
content.summary: Odd things in the sky above rexburg, idaho

content.detailedDescription:
I was stuck on a unknown road with my lover because my car had a flat tire. 
while i was fixing the tire,my lover was looking up at the stars and suddenly noticed a blackish red sphere come out of the sky and land no more than 30 feet from us.  we had no idea what it was. it descended with colorful lights blinking and a strange humming noise. both of us were scared but rather calm. when it landed nothing more than a few walking pieces of cheese stumbled out and looked at us. they seemed rather interested in us which just freaked us out even more. we got very dizzy and nauseated,then it all turned black. when we woke up, it was 5 in the morning. they were gone,but they did leave a piece of metal behind. we immediately attempted to call for the police and a ambulance. however there wasn't any cell service. with the car still there and apparently untouched,we went to the nearest hospital which i would like to not say the name. they couldn't find anything wrong with us nor any type of sedative in our systems............Ah screw it,this whole story was made up. i'm just some bored teenager exploring the internet at 2 in the morning. sorry for any inconvenience.
content.summary: Large sphere landed out of nowhere and little cheese looking beings appeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning late from a tiger game when we saw a bright semi- small object to the west as we entered whittemore, mi. we pulled over and observed then 2  bright  round objects erratically moving back and forth across the sky. sometimes moving slower, faster,  stationary and at times appeared to chase each other. we were out of the car and i thought i had my cell phone camera on video but being exciter i was pressing the buttons on the camera settings. then a larger rectangular brightly lit object appeared and stopped above the tree line. once it changed to green in four equall sections one at a time from right to left. it also sort of shook as if beginning to excelled ate slowly and then shot across the sky. it returned but not the same spot. twice before leaving. we were quite sure it was a ufo as it moved so fast, changed colors and did not move in any standard pattern. one month before we saw 2 similar objects from our home 20 miles away in a rural area, but these items were more the size of a star. however, they did change colors and moved at various speeds in various directions. those we observed through high powere binoculars  and were more v shaped than the items we photographed in whittemore. those photos are time location and date stamped.


having problem attaching photo. if you contact me i will email them to you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Wife and i had a several minute view of several ufo and took pictures.

content.detailedDescription: Retired law enforcement, multiple sighting experience. while standing outside near my back porch i observed out of my top peripheral vision a large bright white sphere that suddenly appeared at an elevation estimated to be 75 degrees. this object was in the nw sky about 15 degrees to the left of 90 degrees straight overhead when first seen. it was about the size of 1/4" to 5/16" inch in diameter at arms length. it had a downward slope to it slightly toward the n of about 10 degrees. this sphere, perfectly round, was a very, very bright white object in color. the size, shape, and color did not vary throughout my observation. there was no trail, no tail, no burning of the material leaving any combustion or debris field behind it. the object was observed in the open sky for 1 second, then it was partially obscured by a tall tree in my yard for the remainder of the event.  what stands out in my mind is how the object flew beyond the branches and leaves of the 50 foot tall tree covering about 60 degrees of the observable field of view to the nw and was so easily seen within the tree due to the magnitude of the light it immitted. there was a second tree behind mine that was farther away and the object did not go below the canopy of the later. there was still another 5 degrees of sky to observe below the tree line if the object continued downward to the ground along the same flight path. i lost view of it mid way in my tree. i estimate that to be approx. 40 degrees elevation. at first my thought was it was a meteor. i have seen hundreds of meteors and many comets in my lifetime. i tried to play this off and forget about it. there were no other observable aircraft or stars in the sky at the time. this object moved slower than a meteor and shared no heating up characteristics like a body moving into the atmospehere. there were no stars visible. i though about this one for some time because it didn't make rational sense. i researched the weather data for the date and time i made this observation at wunderground.Com. on that evening there was overcast around 2,600 k. this object appeared at a relatively low altitude below the cloud cover.
content.summary: A very fast bright white sphere appeared suddenly and travelled on a downward slope.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking, taking pictures from my phone to the roundabout that is located at the stip.
i did not saw the ufo but apeared in my picture. i notesed next day while chequing at my pictures. i though it was a reflect but i dont know what could be... i will send the picture to you to check on it.
content.summary: Apeared in my photo pictured

content.detailedDescription: At 10:30 pm, my sister went outside to feed the dogs. she then saw a big orange light moving slowly in the sky. she came inside and called me and my brother to come look at this strange light in the sky. i thought to myself that she was probably seeing an illusion or a plane until we went outside. this ball of light was getting bigger as it approached our house. we got scared, run inside and closed the door. we went and told our mom about it then my sister went on the back porch and screamed that it was still coming closer and it was getting bigger, my mom came on the porch and saw it. it then moved over the house until we couldn't see it. we all proceeded to the front of the house, opened the front grill and went outside and it was there. by this time two men who were walking by were also pointing to the sky. the ball of light then quickly disappeared before our eyes.  i came online to try and find out what it may have been, several people suggests that it may have been a ball lightening. i have never seen one before so i cannot say exactly if it is. just making a report on what we saw.
content.summary: Huge ball of orange light

content.detailedDescription:
I'll start from when my self and a co-worker decided to start a regular walk around on the property we where guarding i would write down the time we started she chose to go one way i chose the other while i walked i happened to look toward the southward area i noticed a light that was acting weird so i called over my co-worker who was not that from where we started i asked can you see something through the trees she says no at first then the star raised higher in the sky then she swore then she ran toward me to get a better look while we stood there watching this star moving in all direction moving at such speed it would fade in and out of view so i had the crazy idea of giving a signal that we where there once i did i watched it come towards us that we got blinded for moment then watched it leave so i said to my co-worker lets stick together and do a half check cause we where a little scared of what we saw but the odd thing was we returned two and half hrs later when it felt like only five mins
sorry got no evidence just wanted this off my chest cause it bothers me a lil
funny thing was when it was coming towards us i screamed wow what it looked like was all i remember was a bright light while it was far looked like a sphere
that notebook might still be there but it might be buried in a lot of paperwork
content.summary: Eradict star and possible missing time

content.detailedDescription: My daughter came running to my bed in the middle of the night one night when we lived up in the mountains of colorado. i thought she'd had a bad dream.  the next morning when i asked about it,  she told me she didn't have a dream.  that it was real.  she said she woke up and saw a small grey being standing next to her bed looking at her toys.  she said that it then turned it's head and looked at her.  she the got up and ran past it to my room.  she said it did not try to do anything to her but that she was scared.  i got a piece of paper and had her tell me how to draw it.  she described something a little unexpected to me.  while i drew the head like most alien head you see on tv with the big black eyes,  she told me no,  that the were big and dark but more round and had lines on them.  when i asked her if she meant like a flies eyes or an insect,  she said no.  she said they were like crossed lines.  like the eyes had some sort of criss-crosses or x's or something of that nature. she described it as black and yellow.  she also knows her colors pretty well and i was confident when she turned away the orange and red and picked the yellow. she made it sound as if the eyes had some sort of covering on them. she said it also had pointy teeth but i couldn't get a good understanding of what she meant.  i was very surprised at what she described because i have never exposed her to any alien shows or anything that could have given her that visual. i didn't think it fit with what i've always seen or heard about what these little grey men supposedly look like.   unless she was dreaming about one of the teletubbies, my husband and i are at a loss. she also oddly enough told me of a vision or dream she had that felt very real where an asteroid smashed into us killing everyone. she was really scared and i had to reassure her for a couple of days.   these two reports were not far apart. maybe within months of each other.  i just remember being very concerned for her and why she would think up such things. i might have the original drawing i made but i'd have to look through boxes.
content.summary: 5 year old daughter reports entity in room

content.detailedDescription: I saw it .. 120 seconds ,horizon to horizon,,, lost it at 90 degrees,,, flash of light .. full sky . like heat lightning.. effected eyes.. lost it after that. looked for it on lower south horizon..2/3 moon full.. plane at much lower altitude traveling west to east. un affected.
content.summary: Travling north to south...Probably iss  check the time. flash of light

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on route 81 coming from pennsylvania, happened to look at the clouds and noticed what appeared to be a star appear out of thin air followed by a second. they were very bright and exactly resembled a star but at lower altitude. they hovered for about five minutes before vanishing the way they appeared like a fade out.
content.summary: 2 bright hovering lights appearing like a fade in visible for about 5 minutes before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking and talking to a friend it looked up notice brite light in sky very brute but not flickering at all solid and just seam to go real slow like then we lost behind trees ran up the block saw it from different angle hovering shot down beam from under it towards ground like searchlight but very faint then it took off at a great speed
content.summary: Flew over head hover in circles shot out like a beam pointed towards ground the took off high speed

content.detailedDescription:
i was just sitting in the attic in my garage playing a keyboard that sits in front of a large window. i stopped playing to look at the sky when i noticed i could see the moon in daylight. i had read before in internet forums that shining a colored laser out the window might potentially signal ufo craft. as a joke i took a cheap laser i use with my cats (ones specified in the forums have to be a lot more powerful) and pulsed the laser on and off in the sky just right of the moon. i did this for maybe 5 seconds. as i was looking out the window, i noticed a long white craft moving across the sky from right to left. thinking it was an airplane i immediately put the laser down, as i don't want to be that guy who gets arrested for shining a laser at an airplane. it first appeared to the far right of where i flashed the laser in the sky. it was bright white, and depending on exactly how far it was from me when i saw it, it appeared to be around 100 feet long. 
    my immediate first assumption was that it was a plane and that i just didn't see it coming into view, but i could not see any wings or details (including the tail) that i can typically see as planes fly by around here. it flew at speeds similar to that of a commercial airliner, and drifted across the sky. as it continued to head further east, a large electric-blue ball of light formed right behind it and then it was completely gone. not a cloud in the sky, and at the speed it was travelling it should have been easy to see for at least another 3 minutes given its current path and my position. i was shocked, i don't believe that kind of stuff when i come across it on the internet, i never imagined it would lead to me seeing something. there's no way to say that it wasn't just a coincidence but this was all very strange for me nonetheless.
content.summary: Saw craft appear seemingly out of nowhere, fly slow like a plane and then as it went east a blue ball of light appeared behind it, and then it was gone

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street and i felt that something was watching me, look up, and away in the sky i saw a double aa battery shaped cylinder, spinning on its axis. hardly was moving slowly, appeared to be blue and white. i pulled my cell phone and take photographs and film. suddenly disappeared. after seeing the videos, i saw that there was lights and dark spots that appeared and moved intermittently. also an object cross the screen leaving like holograms of himself, really weird. i have no idea what it could be
content.summary: Felt observed, in the sky saw a cilinder spining, take my phone and pictured it
content.locationName: Buenos Aires, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires

content.detailedDescription: As per the request of jan harzan, this is about someplace i visited and was told to report it as a ufo. in 1975 i served as a security policeman at kirtland afb and was stationed on manzano mtn., a nuclear weapons storage dump. the nukes were stored on the outside of the mtn., a secret clearance being required to work there. on the inside of the mtn. was a concrete and steel roadway tunnel large enough for an 18 wheeler. one night on graveyard shift at about 3am i went for a walk up the roadway and at about 1/4 of a mile i came to an intersection where i could see forever in all directions. i continued on straight for another 1/4 mile then came to what seemed like the end. to the left of me was a narrow hallway about 20 yards long and at the end was an 8ftx8ft blast door with a series of locks on it. covering the door were signs of keep-out,radioactive material, top-secret clearance only, etc. at this point a feeling of dread overcame me and i pulled my weapon and backed out slowly. i made my way back to the entrance of the roadway as quick as possible, never mentioned it again and never got caught. i only thought of recently when i saw a ufo story on the history channel about dulce,nm and a contractor who fell into a tunnel and saw a bunch of "greys" and special ops guys. the story mentioned kirtland afb and i got to wondering what was behind that blast door i saw 39 years ago and maybe it linked up to dulce. in any event i suddenly realized it may have been an elevator. do what you want with the info but i never mentioned it before because i was in a restricted area with only a secret clearance. i'm 61 now and don't really give a s**t about it anymore.    thanx mike
content.summary: Not a sighting nor a ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was locking up the restaurant i manage and saw a light in the sky i had not seen before. i then went back into the restaurant to get my coworker and my cell phone to take a video. at first i thought it was a passenger jet and the lights i saw, i thought could be the jets "headlights", but then the object stopped and started to hover in one place, it also started to pulsate. i felt a bit excited at first then there was a calmness about the whole situation. the object just seemed to disapear, but then showed up again in another location, but being able to take a video was hard because it was at the tree line.
content.summary: Pulsating ball of light that appeared to have am x shape in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
On august 5th, a tuesday at 1:34 am subject was leaving home with wife and saw a saucer shaped object with red lights, rapidly travel from  west to east. the craft had redish lights moving from left to right and then right to left.  object at one point disappeared into the clouds and the clouds seemed to take a different shape and the craft turned invisible,the craft at one point seemed to have a haloed cloud surrounding it. the clouds seemed to look hazy and a dark cloud surrounded it, but you could still see it. it then moved toward the west and disappeared. 
subject and his brother have seen many of these similar looking craft before and finally decided to report them.  one sighting they saw monday night was actually being tailed by a military black helicopter
content.summary: Subject was outside with wife and saw a saucer shaped object cross the sky,
